input.sentences: birthday woman is in the hospital but thats okay we are still going to have fun
more family shows up and brings balloons !
man that hat was getting uncomfortable lets adjust it a little bit
birthday woman drinking some water because of the talking
and sadly it is time for us to leave . bye !
output.sentences: I went to the hospital to visit my friend.
Of course my hubby had to come too.
We were helping our friend celebrate, and she loved her birthday hat.
We brought a card signed by out friends.
My hubby and I said goodbye before the staff decided to throw us out.
